name: Rakesh Kumar
bio: Rakesh, as the Executive Vice President of Technology at Formidium, is dedicated to enabling investment firms by leveraging cutting-edge technology, Blockchain, and AI to provide innovative Fintech solutions.  I am a highly experienced professional with a remarkable track record spanning over two decades in the field of IT. I have successfully spearheaded product development, crafted ingenious business solutions, and showcased exceptional expertise in tackling complex challenges. Furthermore, my background includes substantial expertise in blockchain technology, where I have effectively executed and harnessed its potential to achieve successful outcomes.
